message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

The paper presents a lipreading system using visual features, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-categories. The use of domain-adversarial training for speaker independence suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG) and speech recognition (cs.SI) sub-categories. Additionally, the use of LSTM recurrent neural networks suggests a focus on sequence modeling (cs.SD).
